name: Swords of Gargantua
detailed_description:
SWORDS of GARGANTUA is a VR online action game set in a world dominated by a race of giants called the Gargantua. You and up to three other players will join together and fight in epic real-time battles against the Gargantua and its forces; all in finely tuned realistic sword battles!

Features



Experience the adventure of sword-based combat, merging real-life and VR. Every movement is finely tuned and mirrored directly in the virtual world, bringing you closer than ever to the action.



Join other adventures to take down the enemy! With native voice chat, develop strategies together, and dive into combat against ever-increasingly difficult battles.



30 Weapons to unlock, 100 stages to complete in single player, and, should you survive the onslaught of enemies, an epic battle against the massive titan “GARGANTUA”; larger than anything you have faced before.
